title: Uranium rejection with nanofiltration membranes and the influence of environmentally relevant mono- and divalent cations at various pH
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00324A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Christopher B. Yazzie, Catalina Elias, Vasiliki Karanikola
Major groundwater cations can influence the U(IV) rejection of membranes. Water chemistry modeling, membrane characterization, uranium rejection, and membrane selectivity are investigated, with results showing optimal treatment operation at pH 7.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
